home.name: Thibaut Faucheux
home.tagline: 21-year-old engineering student building modern web applications at Pilot Corporation

bio.title: Who I Am
bio.description: I'm Thibaut Faucheux, a 21-year-old engineering student passionate about building scalable web applications and solving complex technical challenges. Currently pursuing my Engineering Degree in Computer Science at CESI Lyon while working as an Application Developer Apprentice at Pilot Corporation of Europe in Annecy, I combine top-tier academic education with hands-on professional experience.
bio.education: Engineering Degree in Computer Science at CESI Lyon (2024-2027)
bio.passion: Passionate about full-stack development, modern web technologies, and continuous improvement
bio.goal: Seeking internship and career opportunities to grow as a software engineer and create meaningful impact

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Academic & Professional Journey
projects.confidentialityNote: Confidentiality Notice: Most of these projects are subject to confidentiality policies. CESI's policy prohibits us from publicly sharing our academic project source code. Similarly, enterprise projects at Pilot Corporation contain confidential information that cannot be disclosed.

2024-2025.title: 3rd Year - Engineering Cycle + Pilot Corporation Work-Study

prep-1-db.title: Database Project - Complete Modeling
prep-1-db.description: Complete relational database design with comprehensive documentation: data dictionary, conceptual model (CDM), logical model (LDM), physical model (PDM), and query algebraic trees. GANTT project management organization.

prep-1-sound.title: Encrypted Sound Communication
prep-1-sound.description: Python inter-computer communication program using encrypted sounds. One computer encrypts a message and emits a sound, intercepted and decrypted by a second computer. Development in Jupyter Notebook.

prep-1-flowgorithm.title: Authentication System - Flowgorithm
prep-1-flowgorithm.description: Card-based authentication system simulation with problem management and use cases. Algorithmic development with Flowgorithm.

prep-1-arduino.title: Embedded Weather Station - Arduino
prep-1-arduino.description: Design and implementation of a connected weather station with Arduino. Temperature, humidity, and atmospheric pressure sensors with LCD display.

prep-2-network.title: City Network Design - Cisco Packet Tracer
prep-2-network.description: Large-scale network and systems project: complete city network connection with IPv4/IPv6 management. Integration of companies with specific needs, system security and robustness.

prep-2-web.title: Student-Company Connection Platform
prep-2-web.description: Indeed-like website to connect students and companies. Apache administration, frontend/backend development, Progressive Web App with authentication and profile management.

prep-2-embedded.title: Software Engineering - Complexity Calculation
prep-2-embedded.description: Embedded software engineering project in C++: algorithmic complexity analysis, software architecture, assembly stack management, and creation of a stock management application with WinForms interface in Visual Studio.

prep-2-stage.title: Internship - Derogation Management App (Pilot Corporation)
prep-2-stage.description: Development of a derogation and instruction management application on Softyflow. Modern stack with MongoDB, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and Vue.js.

perso-portfolio.title: Professional Portfolio - React + Vite
perso-portfolio.description: Modern and interactive personal portfolio developed with React 18 and Vite. Complete architecture with Framer Motion animations, internationalization (EN/FR), dark theme, and responsive design. EmailJS integration, SEO optimization, and continuous deployment.

perso-shopify.title: Melting Time - Shopify E-commerce Store
perso-shopify.description: Complete online store creation on Shopify with theme customization, SEO optimization, and product management.

pilot-onboarding.title: HR Onboarding Application - Pilot Corporation
pilot-onboarding.description: Development of an onboarding platform for new employees. Simple and intuitive interface with internal API integration via Postman. Complete employee integration process management.

highlights.0: Intuitive user interface for new employees

pilot-disputes.title: Dispute Management & Workflow - Pilot Corporation
pilot-disputes.description: Complete dispute management application with workflow automation. Automatic email system between users via Softyflow, tracking dashboard, data archiving for statistics. Quality reception PV management with problem qualification via images, automatic generation of reports, emails and PDFs.

pilot-stock-alerts.title: Best Available Table - Intuiflow/AX Integration - Pilot Corporation
pilot-stock-alerts.description: Application serving as a bridge between Intuiflow and Microsoft Dynamics AX. Centralization and typing of alerts on products near stockout. Bulk import via CSV with automated alert status workflow.

ing-1-twitter.title: Twitter-like - Social Network
ing-1-twitter.description: Complete social network application with real-time features: posts, likes, comments, user profiles. Modern architecture with React, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB and Docker.

ing-1-easysave-v1.title: EasySave v1.0 - Console Application
ing-1-easysave-v1.description: .NET Core backup management software. Console application with limitation to 5 simultaneous jobs, logging and status tracking via JSON files.

ing-1-easysave-v3.title: EasySave v3.0 - WPF Interface
ing-1-easysave-v3.description: Major evolution of EasySave with WPF graphical interface. Individual control of each backup job (Play, Pause, Stop). Integrates all features from previous versions.

ing-1-active-directory.title: Active Directory Administration
ing-1-active-directory.description: Complete management of a fictitious company: Active Directory creation and configuration with rights, security and policy management. Deployment on Windows Server VMs.

ing-1-research-ops.title: Operations Research - Travelling Salesman Problem
ing-1-research-ops.description: Comparative study of TSP (Travelling Salesman Problem) solving algorithms. Implementation and analysis of ant colony algorithm and other heuristics.

ing-2-bigdata.title: Big Data - CHU Data Centralization
ing-2-bigdata.description: Big Data project for a University Hospital Center: centralization and massive data analysis. Big Data stack with Talend, Cloudera, Hive and Power BI for visualization.
